text: Ia tintinimɨn kantrin igharazibar ghuegha dar aven itiba, kɨ ia inigh azenan izɨ, egh kɨ mughuriar aghuim zuir ofaba bagha bar akongezɨ moghɨn, kɨ ia bagh navim deragh bar akuegham. Eghtɨ Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamiziba, bizir kɨ ia gamir kabar ganigh kamaghɨn fogh suam, nan araziba bar zue.
